divs: Sighting DetailsI also saw the same triangle planes bottomes were all black i was up kinda high the tops seem to change alittle at a distance the seemed flat thats why it caught my eye it changed the lights that were in a row on the bottom it was a fantastic light show it change lights form read to blue yeah a police vehicle NOOOO these lights grew dimmer and got intensly bright they were in a straight light on a large flat <It looked lighter than air because it seemed to float but it definatly pulled some arobatics So while im looking at the one in the distance and all the helicopters flying around it all the sudden i here a sound like a plane small plane and a black helicopter flys past directly ova my high rise and headed the opposite way a traingle was moving over the building very slowly it was so black you really couldnt see it but i saw the giant shadow in the dark the triangle dwarfed this black heli while traveling in the opposite direction the helicopter started to turn on lights it turned on 3 then 4 then 3 lights like the traingle that was further away still shining lights while being swarmed by i say 5-6 helicopters that yes it was night time but they had no light s and then the would turn on a set and then bam there was a heli!!! it was two very large ufos at once and i have witnesses!!!! after the trangle passed completly over the helicopter i heard a rumble and it moved slow but fast .... Like I can explain slow but fast,the craft didnt tremble the was a movement like a glass flying through the airit moved very far but it seemed like it was drifting slowly the helicopter was moving very quickly by comparison
